Class.name: Habr.ArticlesEnumerationPage
Class.Description: Contains information from pages of Intersystems blog on habr (https://habrahabr.ru/company/intersystems/)

Method.name: hasNext
Method.Implementation: s delimiter = "<li><a title=""На страницу вперед (Alt + →)"" class=""next"" id=""next_page"" href=""/company/intersystems/" s pos = ..Html.FindAt( 1, delimiter ) if ( pos = -1 ) Q 0 QUIT $$$OK

Method.name: findAllReferences
Method.Description: This pages (habrahabr.ru/company/intersystems/page*/) contain links to intersystems's articles. Purpose of this method - find them all
